name: io.github.umbraco/Umbraco-Forms-MCP-Dev
description: A developer focused model context protocol (MCP) server for Umbraco Forms

environmentVariables.description: Base URL of your Umbraco instance
environmentVariables.name: UMBRACO_BASE_URL

environmentVariables.description: API key for the Umbraco Forms Delivery API (enables form definition retrieval and submissions)
environmentVariables.name: UMBRACO_FORMS_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of tool collections to include (e.g., form,record,data-source)
environmentVariables.name: UMBRACO_INCLUDE_TOOL_COLLECTIONS

environmentVariables.description: Enable readonly mode to disable all write operations (create, update, delete). Only read and query tools remain available.
environmentVariables.name: UMBRACO_READONLY

environmentVariables.description: Disable chaining to the Umbraco CMS MCP server
environmentVariables.name: DISABLE_MCP_CHAINING
